case.title: Job for a girl offered ! (London)
case.text: Hi, I would like to offer a nice income to a very pretty, stylish and easy going girl (or two girls), possibly a student, from London or very close. You must be 18-25 years old Good cash offered, possibly regular, not time consuming and fun. Excellent if you are a student in need or just a girl who needs some extra money with little time commitments. If interested please get back with a few words about yourself and send a recent photo. PS. Please do not respond if you are an escort, drug user or similar
